name: GALACTIC FIELD：Strategy Edition 银河领域：策略版
developer: Two thousand and one entertainment studio
publisher: Two thousand and one entertainment studio
description: This is a new-concept strategy game for leisure time. The game happens in the long future in the universe. It is about the war between different space ship fleets. Players join the wars as fleet commanders. You can command the fleet, fight against the enemies in the frontline. The game advocates leisure, smartness and realness.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: pentium4 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: MX-440 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 770 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP VISTA  WIN7 WIN8 WIN10 Processor: AMD Sempron 2800 Memory: 1GHz MB RAM Graphics: X850 & NV5900 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 770 MB available space
